name: Angel's Burning: Blue Savior
general_description:
Ahead of the release of the first ever Sonic the Hedgehog live action movie, I decided to create a tribute song.

Modeled from the perspective of a resident of Angel Island and featuring original lyrics and...dancing (lol), this cover is a wild ride heavily based on the music from Angel Island Zone Act 2 from probably my favorite video game of all time, Sonic 3 and Knuckles.
project_involvement: While serving on almost everything audio on this track, I also cut the track’s music video and enlisted the help of the amazing dancer, Steven “RTHYTHM” Garcia.
